text:
@GrandpaSnarky 137,000 dead from COVID19

50 million had to apply for unemployment insurance in the first half of 2020

states shutting down again from COVID19 spikes because they re-opened early, did not test everyone and isolate those positive

Nikki Haley must have had a stroke or something
